content: Might be useful to have an HL7 presence at this? https://www.ftc.gov/news-events/press-releases/2020/03/ftc-announces-september-22-workshop-data-portability (@Hans Buitendijk is this something the policy advisory committee should look at? or US realm?)
@John Moehrke : PAC sounds like a good place to make them aware. Current chair is Jamie Ferguson. Want me to forward?
